name: VEX (itch)
description:
Vex is a project created in 24h for a Hackathon which topic was "Light and Rebuilding".

Vex, the main character, will have to make it's way through several levels plagued by obstacles representing keyboard keys, picking up several pieces to rebuild the exit button.

If it was not enough, there is an electrical failure, giving a blackout, so the little Vex will have to use his flashlight to light the way. In it, you will find narrow aisles and crannies that can only be overcome if the player places his hands on the keyboard to generate the complicated combinations that obstruct the passage to the pieces of the exit button.

To enjoy the best experience, download the .exe and have fun!

With the collaboration of MSI.
